resources.name: en
resources.title: English
resources.string_add: Note, that improper use of HTML may break the site layout.
Enable lessening for CSS files (cache should be enabled)
Enable lessening for JS files (cache should be enabled)
Connect with people that share your passion.

Stories, ideas, photos, videos, questions, jokes, discussions, anything.
Follow inspiring people and inspire your followers.

"Pull up a chair. Take a taste.
Come join us. Life is so endlessly
delicious."
"The only way to have a friend is to be one."
Profiles module to install by default.

Studio is where you customise your site; add and manage apps; control languages and design; set membership levels and permissions; build pages and navigation, and a lot more. You are now in Studio Launcher.

Apps are modules, languages, tools, templates - all the bits and pieces that make your site unique. You can download and install Apps and they will appear in Studio Launcher. Apps add and change functionality of your site.

Designer is the best place to start customisation. Change the site logo, choose design template and manage the “Cover Page”. Your site now shows Cover Page to all guest visitors. You can either customise it to turn it off to display a full homepage with content of your choice.
One look and you know it
Dashboard gives a quick overview of the site status. Trident version, space usage, hosting tools and cache. Different Apps will add their blocks to Dashboard.
Build your site the way you want it

Pages allow you to edit the site by rearranging, adding and removing blocks on site pages. You can even create new custom pages of different types. You can also control visibility settings, SEO data, cacheing and page layouts.
Create and edit Membership Levels and associated Actions permissions.

Forms builder is powerful tool that allows deep customisation of site database and forms. You can create and mange data lists, form fields and even display types (like Add/Edit/Delete). Your Forms will define the structure and theme of the site.
Add and manage site navigation menus. You can edit links, re-order them, add new ones, change icons and control visibility according to membership permissions.

"If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart." Polyglot allows you to set site language and data format, edit site texts in all installed languages and even translate email templates.
Activate reorganisation mode to rearrange Apps in Launcher or delete inactive ones altogether.
Your Studio may have hundreds of installed Apps. Choose the ones you access most often and use the Star to bring them up.

Trident comes with only a handful of core Apps. Choose, download and install Apps to add profiles types, modules, system tools, plugins, languages and design templates. You can activate and deactivate installed Apps. Trident is super-modular and incredibly flexible, letting you choose your own combination of functionality, settings and database structure to make the social site of your dreams real. Even without changing anything you will have the perfectly functioning social site!
At first there isn't much here. Install more Apps via Studio, add more blocks via Studio > Pages > Homepage, create profiles, appoint admins, post some content and your site will come alive!
Get to know your Account Menu
Add and manage profiles, check notifications, access account settings. Admins and Moderators can use it to access Dash with links to site content and profiles management.
resources.string_upd: Field title, displayed in Studio only.

The payment was successfully accepted and should be processed automatically in a few minutes. Then the purchased product(s) will be available in Apps -> Purchases. If it doesn't happen for some reason, please contact product's vendor with your payment details.
